name: Money Birds
description:
Easily the best “Bird” App you can have and the by far the most fun. Stop playing against yourself and compete against the world!

Now with Real Money Tournaments & Multiplayer via GamyTech!
Compete against your fellow Money Birds Fanatics in 1 vs. 1 real money games

Features

¤ REAL MONEY GAME: Play for cash prizes against other players around the world.

¤ FREE COINS DAILY: Collect your virtual bonus every day.

¤ FREE GIFTS: Receive special bonuses and promotions.

¤ INSTANT WORLDWIDE PLAY: Choose a board and play immediately against players from all over the world

¤ BEAUTIFUL AND UNIQUE UI: A chic and classy design.

Don't be angry birds 2 players is always more fun! So download our app, and start challenging your friends !

Apple is not associated with or responsible for any contests within this app.
